name: Araquanid

passive.name: Water Tension
passive.effect: Whenever the opponent discards an Energy, draw a card.

attacks.name: Spider Web
attacks.effect: The Defending Pokemon cannot retreat next turn.

attacks.name: Bubble Net
attacks.effect: If the Defending Pokemon has 60 or less maximum HP, deal 40 damage.

flavor: Using water tension, they hunt and capture prey. Small prey especially have a tough time escaping the bubble Araquanid inhabits.
